awd_titl_txt: Science Exhibits at the Missouri Botanical Garden
awd_abstract_narration: Interactive science exhibits will be designed,                             developed, and installed in the Brookings Interpretive                          Center at the Missouri Botanical Garden.  The Brookings                         Interpretive Center is a new educational facility attached                      to the Climatron, a geodesic dome greenhouse.  The exhibits                     will be installed in one of five theme areas:  Tropical Rain                    Forest Biome, Tropical Rain Forests at Risk, Global                             Ecosystem, Desert Biome, and Temperate Biome.  In addition                      to the science exhibits, the project will develop a series                      of science demonstrations to be used in the Brookings                           Interpretive Center and will allow for additional signage                       and audio effects to be added to the Climatron.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
